item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a college student majoring in Computer Science at National Taipei University of Technology (Taipei Tech). I am doing part time research at Academia Sinica supervised by Prof. Wang, Hsin-Min and Prof. Ko, Ming-Tat. Prior to that, I was a data engineer intern at LINE Taiwan, I develop NLP tools to solve real world problems. Before I pivoted to the filed of NLP, I was a software developer intern in iCook and Glossika.

item.title: Publication
item.description: Preprint International conference AlloST: Low-resource Speech Translation without Source Transcription Yao-Fei Cheng, Hung-Shin Lee, and Hsin-Min Wang [arXiv] [code] In Proc. INTERSPEECH 2021 (Acceptance rate: ? %)
